title: 820-2936-B blue tint refuse to boot to asd or install os
message:
hey guys

Suprisingly very clean board. The one and ONLY problem i have spotted is one of the traces is corroded - deep. DP_T29SNK0_ML_N it connects to pin 2 of C3623.
If you look on the board view all the caps located in the same area are taking 3.3v on the pin 2.

Would it be a problem if i borrow 3.3 from another cap and run a jumper? and is this where the potential issue may be or would you suspect there is some other underlying problem?
thanks for your help.

title: 820-2936-B blue tint refuse to boot to asd or install os
message:
There are many DP_T29SNK0_ML_N lines.
And that cap doesn't go to 3V3; is just AC coupling (DC separation), like the others in the same area.
No idea which schematic are you looking...

However thunderbolt lines shouldn't be a problem, untill you connect an external device.

Try clean ME BIOS...

title: 820-2936-B blue tint refuse to boot to asd or install os
message: T29 is for thunderbolt and is irrelevant. Does it boot internally?

title: 820-2936-B blue tint refuse to boot to asd or install os
820-2936-B blue tint refuse to boot to asd or install os
message: try booting from an external drive then running the install on internal drive while in the OS?
